changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, header TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(32 > LENGTH(header)), body TEXT NULL CHECK(256 > LENGTH(body)), created_at TIMESTAMPZ NOT NULL, user_id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id), order_id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL REFERENCES orders(id), );
